name: Richard Shelby
bullets: on  | 2021–present: Vice Chair of the Senate Appropriations Committee | 2018–2021: Chair of the Senate Appropriations Committee | 2017–2018: Chair of the Senate Rules Committee | 2017–2018: Chair of the Joint Printing Committee | 2003–2007, 2015–2017: Chair of the Senate Banking Committee | 2013–2015: Ranking Member of the Senate Appropriations Committee | 2007–2013: Ranking Member of the Senate Banking Committee | 2001–2003: Ranking Member of the Senate Intelligence Committee | 1997–2001: Chair of the Senate Intelligence Committee
